title: Awesome List Updates on Jan 10, 2025
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jan 10, 2025 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Loggers / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-wlog (⭐2)](https://github.com/w5g-wywiwyg/ngx-wlog) - A logger for Angular applications, drawing inspiration from the .NET [NLog](https://nlog-project.org/).

### Media / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-cam-shoot (⭐3)](https://github.com/RzoDev/ngx-cam-shoot) - A streamlined Angular component that simplifies using your device's camera and accelerates image capture and saving.

### Storage / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [rxdb](https://rxdb.info/) - RxDB can be used as an abstraction layer for [IndexedDB](https://rxdb.info/articles/angular-indexeddb.html).
items.content_html:
Loggers / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-wlog (⭐2) - A logger for Angular applications, drawing inspiration from the .NET NLog.

Media / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-cam-shoot (⭐3) - A streamlined Angular component that simplifies using your device's camera and accelerates image capture and saving.

Storage / Google Developer Experts

  • rxdb - RxDB can be used as an abstraction layer for IndexedDB.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [vivi (⭐0)](https://github.com/rufevean/vivi) - Integrates Google's [Gemini](https://gemini.google.com) language model (LLM) capabilities directly into your terminal. It allows you to send queries to the language model and receive AI-generated solutions, all within your terminal. The plugin supports session context and can dynamically execute received commands.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • vivi (⭐0) - Integrates Google's Gemini language model (LLM) capabilities directly into your terminal. It allows you to send queries to the language model and receive AI-generated solutions, all within your terminal. The plugin supports session context and can dynamically execute received commands.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Content Management Systems (CMS)

*   [Localess](https://localess.org/home) `⚠` - Powerful translation management and content management system. Manage and translate your website or app content into multiple languages, using AI to translate faster. ([Source Code (⭐61)](https://github.com/Lessify/localess)) `MIT` `Docker`

### Software / File Transfer - Single-click & Drag-n-drop Upload

*   [Digirecord](https://ladigitale.dev/digirecord/) - Record and share audio files (documentation in French). ([Source Code](https://codeberg.org/ladigitale/digirecord)) `AGPL-3.0` `Nodejs/PHP`

### Software / Miscellaneous

*   [Digicut](https://ladigitale.dev/digicut/) - Cut audio and video files using FFMPEG.wasm (documentation in French). ([Source Code](https://codeberg.org/ladigitale/digicut)) `AGPL-3.0` `Nodejs`
*   [Digiread](https://ladigitale.dev/digiread/) `⚠` - Clean up online pages and articles using Mozilla's Readability (documentation in French). ([Source Code](https://codeberg.org/ladigitale/digiread)) `AGPL-3.0` `Nodejs/PHP`

### Software / Software Development - API Management

*   [Opik](https://www.comet.com/site/products/opik/) `⚠` - Evaluate, test, and ship LLM applications with a suite of observability tools to calibrate language model outputs across your dev and production lifecycle. ([Source Code (⭐11k)](https://github.com/comet-ml/opik)) `Apache-2.0` `Docker/Python`
items.content_html:
Software / Content Management Systems (CMS)

  • Localess ⚠ - Powerful translation management and content management system. Manage and translate your website or app content into multiple languages, using AI to translate faster. (Source Code (⭐61)) MIT Docker

Software / File Transfer - Single-click & Drag-n-drop Upload

  • Digirecord - Record and share audio files (documentation in French). (Source Code) AGPL-3.0 Nodejs/PHP

Software / Miscellaneous

  • Digicut - Cut audio and video files using FFMPEG.wasm (documentation in French). (Source Code) AGPL-3.0 Nodejs
  • Digiread ⚠ - Clean up online pages and articles using Mozilla's Readability (documentation in French). (Source Code) AGPL-3.0 Nodejs/PHP

Software / Software Development - API Management

  • Opik ⚠ - Evaluate, test, and ship LLM applications with a suite of observability tools to calibrate language model outputs across your dev and production lifecycle. (Source Code (⭐11k)) Apache-2.0 Docker/Python

items.title: Awesome for Beginners
items.content_text:
### Java * [Catima - Android App (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/CatimaLoyalty/Android) *(label: good first issue)*
Catima, a Loyalty Card & Ticket Manager for Android ### TypeScript * [Berry - Active development trunk for Yarn (⭐7.8k)](https://github.com/yarnpkg/berry) *(label: good first issue)*
Fast, reliable, and secure dependency management.
items.content_html:
Java

  • Catima - Android App (⭐1.2k) (label: good first issue)
    Catima, a Loyalty Card & Ticket Manager for Android

TypeScript

  • Berry - Active development trunk for Yarn (⭐7.8k) (label: good first issue)
    Fast, reliable, and secure dependency management.

items.title: Awesome Nix
items.content_text:
### Command-Line Tools / Discovery

*   [nixfmt (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/NixOS/nixfmt) - A formatter for Nix code, intended to easily apply a uniform style.

### Development / Discovery

*   [Conflake](https://ratson.github.io/conflake/) - A batteries included, autoload files, convention-based configuration framework for `flake.nix`.
items.content_html:
Command-Line Tools / Discovery

  • nixfmt (⭐1.2k) - A formatter for Nix code, intended to easily apply a uniform style.

Development / Discovery

  • Conflake - A batteries included, autoload files, convention-based configuration framework for flake.nix.

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Templates / Vanilla

*   [template-vite (⭐109)](https://github.com/phaserjs/template-vite) - An official quickstart template with Phaser.
*   [template-vite-ts (⭐143)](https://github.com/phaserjs/template-vite-ts) - An official quickstart template with Phaser and TypeScript.
items.content_html:
Templates / Vanilla

  • template-vite (⭐109) - An official quickstart template with Phaser.
  • template-vite-ts (⭐143) - An official quickstart template with Phaser and TypeScript.

items.title: Awesome Cakephp
items.content_text:
### Email

*   [SendGrid plugin (⭐5)](https://github.com/sprintcube/cakephp-sendgrid) - Email transport plugin for sending email via SendGrid API.
items.content_html:
Email

  • SendGrid plugin (⭐5) - Email transport plugin for sending email via SendGrid API.

items.title: Awesome Magento2
items.content_text:
